original: Aschan, Birger Johan Nilsson, fd. jägmästare. Ryssby, f. 29/8/77 i Öja, Kronob. 1., av bruksäg. o. jägm. Janne A. o. Ottilia D :son Aschan. G. 23 m. Ebba Märta Fredrica von Krusenstjerna. — Stud:ex. 98, Ombergs skogssk. 01, ex. v. skogsinst. 03. E. jägm. i Smål. distr. 04, assist, i Kalmar revir 06, bitr. jägm. där 10, förvalt. v. Ham-marsebo skolrevir, förest, f. Hammar-sebo skogssk. 13, jägmästare i Sun-nerå revir 28-40. RVO.
translated: Aschan, Birger Johan Nilsson, former forester. Born in Ryssby on August 29, 1877, in Öja, Kronob. Son of industrialist and forester Janne A. and Ottilia D:s Aschan. Married to Ebba Märta Fredrica von Krusenstjerna in 1923. He passed his high school exam in 1898, attended Omberg's forestry school in 1901, and graduated from the forestry institute in 1903. He became a forester in the Småland district in 1904, was an assistant in the Kalmar district in 1906, deputy forester there in 1910, managed the Hammar-sebo school district, and served as a superintendent for the Hammar-sebo forestry school from 1913 to 1928. From 1928 to 1940, he was a forester in the Sunnerå district, and was awarded the Order of Vasa (RVO).
